comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050923-1000

I think i was replacing all newlines with an empty string when this error showed
up in the log.  I have been unable to reproduce the failure.

The stack trace points to this line of code:
Replace lastReplace= (Replace) fReplaceList.get(fReplaceList.size() - 1);

It looks like fReplaceList was cleared after the size was requested but before
the get.  I am guessing another thread was involved, so getting a test case is
almost impossible.

The information from comment 2 and the stacktrace from comment 0 should be
enough to reopen this issue.

>I am guessing another thread was involved, so getting a test case is...
The document and the backing store are not designed to be accessed by multiple
threads. Hence we need to have more info about the use case.

In which editor did this happen? Was some other plug-in installed?
No other plugins installed.  Standard text editor, editing a normal text file.

Strange. Maybe the document got corrupted by some other command that was
previously executed.
